help-file.title: AFK BRB BBL
help-file.content:
Common acronyms used by players. These terms are commonly used on Duris by players rather than typing out the full words. They mean:
AFK -away from keyboard BRB -be right back BBL -be back later OMG -oh my goodness
They are also socials that can be used by simply typing them, announcing to a person or the room. You can type "command socials" for a full list.
